NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
COLEUS: The shuttle has landed safely. Friends, our survey expedition of this stormy planet is officially underway!
2
1
THATCH: I never imagined after the crash we would one day explore a new planet together again, my friends.. I feel overcome by both gratitude, and excitement!
3
2
MELORAE: Come now, my dear nephew. We have wept enough during our reunion, and every day since.. Now is the time to bask in the joy of exploration!
4 3
PLUME: I only hope we may find Keek, and our many other lost friends on this stormy planet.
5
4
PLUME: Come, my friends. This stormy planet does not appear keen to have guests. We should explore this island for shelter before those great cyclones head our way.
6
5
THATCH: An update: friends, this island appears to have a wonderful, cavernous interior!
7
6
THATCH: Until we can find more ideal shelter, I believe we should move our supplies from this camp into there.
Pioneer EX1 1
Pioneer EX2 7
Pioneer_Int R1 7
